utterances: Leafy how can I tell my daily energy consumption
Hi leafy how do I know how much i consumed today
Where can I see how much i consumed today
answers: The  top left dashboard shows your consumptions today. Do you want to see last month's detailed energy history?

utterances: Leafy what is a green streak
Leafy how do I see my green streak
Leafy what is a green streak
answers: A green streak is the amount of consecutive days in which you manage to stay under the threshold! In other words, it's the amount of days in which you overall save energy
That would be me! You can see me in the bottom right, call me Leafy! If you forgot how the mirror works, just press the question mark on the top of the screen

utterances: Leafy which functions do you have
What are you, abominable freak of nature
answers: If you forgot what my components do, press the question mark at the top. Did you instead want to know about the data i can show you?

utterances: What type of graphs can you display to me
Hey leafy, which graphs can i see?
Hey leafy, what graphs i can visualize
answers:
I can show you past data! Just ask me these:
"How much did i consume yesterday?" ,
"How much did i consume last month?" ,
"Show me the appliance history"

utterances: Hey leafy what about those stars
Hey leafy what are star days
How do i get a star
answers: If you succesfully complete your quest AND have a green day, you'll earn a star. But remember, even if you complete the quest, no green day will result in no star!

utterances: Hey leafy tell me about those leaves
Hey leafy what are green days
answers: If you successfully save enough energy in a day it will be marked as a leaf in the calendar. Get enough leaves and stars and level leafy up!

utterances: Hey leafy tell me about that X
Hey leafy what are bad days
answers: Every day you waste too much energy will be marked in the calendar as an X. Be careful! Those Xs will make me weak!

utterances: How do i know today's quest
Hey leafy what are bad days
answers: Every day you waste too much energy will be marked in the calendar as an X. Be careful! Those Xs will make me weak!
